definition: lit. flowers in a mirror and the moon reflected in the lake (idiom)/fig. an unrealistic rosy view/viewing things through rose-tinted spectacles/also written 水月鏡花|水月镜花
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Still remember the days when you are infatuated with mirage?
sentences.chinese: 可還記得那迷戀鏡花水月的日子嗎？

sentences.english: That achievement is at bottom empty?
In the fanciful reflection of the moonlit water.
However, 25 years later the DRDO missiles remain off target.
sentences.chinese: 但是在25年之後，DRDO的導彈仍然是鏡花水月。

sentences.english: The past is the past, don't miss nothing else.
sentences.chinese: 過去就是過去了，不要留戀鏡花水月。

sentences.english: That passes just like a flower in the mirror and a moon in the lake.
sentences.chinese: 那只是一場鏡花水月雜用英語說？

definition: (of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental

pinyin: ren2 sheng1 he2 chu4 bu4 xiang1 feng2

definition: doubly homesick for our dear ones at each festive day (from a poem by Wang Wei 王維|王维[Wang2 Wei2])
pinyin: mei3 feng2 jia1 jie2 bei4 si1 qin1

definition: to regard the four corners of the world all as home (idiom)/to feel at home anywhere/to roam about unconstrained/to consider the entire country, or world, to be one's own
the shrike and the swallow fly in different directions (idiom)/(usually of a couple) to part from each other
answering phrase of duet/to sing antiphonal answer
